name: Astrolaser (itch)
description:
Originally made for a jam, Astrolaser is an old-school arcade shoot-em-up.

  • Make your way through level 10 (I dare you) by overcoming asteroids, meteors, aliens and dangerous tunnels
  • Experience an true sense of adventure with only three lives against merciless RNG-placed hazards
  • Make points and highscores! Yay!
  • Mobile-friendly! (for Chrome at least)
